entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
